  name: 'Category',
  fields: {
    title: { type: 'string', required: true },
  },
}))

  // ...
  fields: {
    category: {
      type: 'nested',
      of: Category,
    },
  },
}))

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-fragment":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#282c34"},"data-language":"js","data-theme":"default",raw:`const Tag = defineNestedType(() => ({
  name: 'Tag',
  fields: {
    title: { type: 'string', required: true },
  },
}))

const Category = defineNestedType(() => ({
  name: 'Category',
  fields: {
    title: { type: 'string', required: true },
  },
}))

defineDocumentType(() => ({
  // ...
  fields: {
    category: {
      type: 'nested',
      of: [Category, Tag],
    },
  },
}))

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-fragment":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#282c34"},"data-language":"js","data-theme":"default",raw:`const Category = defineNestedType(() => ({
  name: 'Category',
  filePathPattern: 'categories/*.md',
  fields: {
    title: { type: 'string', required: true },
  },
}))

defineDocumentType(() => ({
  // ...
  fields: {
    category: {
      type: 'reference',
      of: Category,
    },
  },
}))
